amendment.description: An amendment numbered 46 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds from being used to implement the Paris Agreement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 213 (Roll no. 477).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A022) Agreed to by recorded vote: 219 - 213 (Roll no. 477).
